summary: UNP meshes for the Savior\'s Hide Redux, the light armor set made by Carah.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i1267.photobucket.com/albums/jj553/jaimekelly76/StagsHead.png[/img][/center]

[b]INSTALL:[/b]

1 - Download and Install the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19443]Savior\'s Hide Redux[/url] armour mod by Carah.

I strongly suggest that you go see his mod page first and read the descriptions. These are 3 different sets of light armor with good stats, male & Female. Comes in \"snowy\" white, \"wolfy\" black or \"beary\" brown. Of course these UNP Meshes here are for females.

2- Download & Extract the .rar file here.

3- Copy & Paste the extracted Meshes folder in your Skyrim/Data directory.

4- Choose \"Yes\" to merge the Meshes folder and \"Yes to all\" when asked to overwrite the previous .nif files.

Enjoy!

Note: meshes based on & inspired by Exeter\'s work on his [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7305]UNP Female Armors[/url] mod.
author: Didier47 and Carah

files.name: UNP Meshes for Saviors Hide Redux
